Modify Menu

Choose Modify - Convert (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert

Choose Modify - Convert - To Curve (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert - To Curve

Choose Modify - Convert - To Polygon (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert - To Polygon

Choose Modify - Convert - To 3D (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert - To 3D

Choose Modify - Convert - To 3D Rotation Object (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert - To 3D Rotation Body

Choose Modify - Convert - To Bitmap (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert - To Bitmap

Choose Modify - Convert - To Metafile (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert - To Metafile

Choose Modify - Convert - To Contour (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Convert - To Contour

Choose Modify - Arrange - In Front of Object (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Arrange - In Front of Object

On the Drawing bar, open the Arrange toolbar and click:

In Front of Object

Choose Modify - Arrange - Behind Object (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Arrange - Behind Object

On the Drawing bar, open the Arrange toolbar and click:

Behind Object

Choose Modify - Arrange - Reverse (LibreOffice Draw only)

Open the context menu of a selected object and choose Arrange - Reverse

On the Drawing bar, open the Arrange toolbar and click:

Reverse

Choose Modify - Combine (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select two or more objects, open the context menu and choose Combine.

Choose Modify - Split (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select a combined object, open the context menu and choose Split.

Choose Modify - Connect (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select two or more lines, open the context menu and choose Connect.

Choose Modify - Break (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select a line that was created by connecting two or more lines, open the context menu and choose Break.

Choose Modify - Shapes (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select two or more objects, open the context menu and choose Shapes

Choose Modify - Shapes - Merge (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select two or more objects, open the context menu and choose Shapes - Merge

Choose Modify - Shapes - Subtract (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select two or more objects, open the context menu and choose Shapes - Subtract

Choose Modify - Shapes - Intersect (LibreOffice Draw only)

Select two or more objects, open the context menu and choose Shapes - Intersect

Title is: Modify Menu
